name: The Dungeon (itch) (CC)
description:
Will you be able to solve the riddles and defeat Mindartis? Only time will tell...

This is my interpretation of a one shot I ran (Dungeons and Dragons). The original module will be linked here if you want to run this with your party:

https://www.kassoon.com/dnd/mini-module-ancient-facility/

(if you want a more put together version, I made a pdf file for ease of use with stats and all)
